body.name: Magic Mirror,Interactive software for children's health education
features: Tips: This is the price of the software.
If you purchase the product, we will schedule a remote installation and debugging appointment with you to release the license key.
Recommended hardware configuration: Host Disk Size : 240G Ram: 16G Processor Type: Intel Core i5 Processor Speed: 4.5GHz GPU: GT 1650 4G

Camera Focal Length: 5~50mm Aperture: 1.6 Image Standard: 1080P Interface: USB 2.0, compatible with USB 3.0 Image Sensor: CMOS Maximum Frame Rate: 30fps Video Quality: Max 1080P (1920x1080) Resolution: MJPEG: 19201080, 1280720, 640480, 800600, etc. Microphone: Yes Image Processing: Manual focus (brightness, contrast, saturation, hue, clarity, white balance) Effective Pixels: 2.1 million Interface: USB 2.0, compatible with USB 3.0 Driver Standard: Plug and Play Voltage/Current: USB 5.0V / <150mA
body.description: This product requires the use of a display screen and a camera for interactive purposes. We can provide design blueprints and hardware specifications for the display screen. Designed specifically for children, the software encompasses six common issues children may face: overeating, picky eating, neglecting tooth brushing, poor hygiene, staying up late, and unhealthy eye habits. Each bad habit can have negative effects on the body. When a child stands in front of the screen, they see themselves on the display. Based on the system settings, their on-screen reflection undergoes magical transformations corresponding to the set habits. For example, if set to overeating, the player will see their on-screen self transformed into a chubby figure. If set to neglecting tooth brushing, the player will witness their on-screen teeth turning yellow and dirty, with significant cavities. This exaggerated interactive approach aims to encourage children to develop healthy lifestyle habits.
